description: Square array read by antidiagonals with T(n,k)=T(n,k-1)^2-n*T(n,k-1)+1 and T(n,0)=0.
links: Index entries for sequences of form a(n+1)=a(n)^2 + ...
crossrefs: Rows include A003095, A057427, A000035. Columns include A000004, A000012, A022958, A001844 (offset). Cf. A060136.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 05 2001
